label: Manage
description: for general activities that cannot be specifically related to any of the other activities, including project controls, overall contract management

label: Control
description: for all controlling related works, including HSE, QA/QC, cost

label: Design
description: for all design related activities at all the stages, including interfaces, as-built

label: Procurement
description: for procurement related activities and works, including related contract management

label: Install
description: for all construction and installation carried out at the project sites

label: Site Test
description: for all testing works and activities carried out at the project sites

label: Factory Test
description: for all testing works and activities not carried out at the project sites, including at manufacturers or contractors owned facilities

label: Commission and Certify
description: for all commissioning and certification related activities

label: Maintain
description: for all meintenance activities, either during or after the project

label: Operate
description: for all operation activities, either during or after the project, including management of rail traffic during the project implementation
